mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, m.no as memberNo, m.name as memberName FROM board b, members m WHERE b.member_no = m.no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (no, title, content, member_no) VALUES (seq_board_pk.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.member_no as memberNo, m.name as memberName FROM board b, members m WHERE b.member_no = m.no AND b.no = #{value}
